title: @Riot Please at least give Lord Mordekaiser some purple/pinkish recolored effects
body:
https://imgur.com/GVRoHmr

It's his only 975 rp skin besides Pentakill and it's not getting any love, and it seems like Pentakill will get completely new particles and all. The fact that Lord Morde has purplish blue accents on his mace and armor (the gems embedded in them) while his particles are still a light blue/green color is also a bit jarring.

Even simple recolored VFX would do wonders for it.

replies.body: the shadowy green looks cool but if they do recolor his effect do it purple like the gems on his armor. pink would look ugly.

Yeah, no pink. This skin would be great if the VFX was purple instead of teal. AMAZING, in fact.

Too bad lightning can't go around him when his passive us up, like OG Mord.

Tho he deserves it; why be prompted to buy the Lord skin when there are no unique VFX? Especially when you look at the amazing quality of skins that are released these days.

This. The bladed mace was the most prominent feature of the old skin.

I agree that they should do it with this skin. I’m loving his new thematic and all but the skin lines are just bland with his other skins only having the base effects or pentakill and infernal having fire effects. Maybe they could do a purple lightning particle effects for this skin? It would be cool and i think would still match the skins. Just my 2 cents. I hope they do add effects though.
I also would like the cape to be bigger on mace of spaces.
do u mean king of spades?
King of clubs*
Look I'm triple wrong now guy.

About the cape or King Diamond?

XP
The skin name, I personally would like it if as a part of the skin he gets a more grandiose cape compared to baseline Morde.
I'm kinda 50/50 on it.  I did like the larger cape but having his model less obstructed is nice too.

Give Lord Mordekaiser purple effects and possibly the same idle stance that Pentakill has to easily resolve clipping issues.
Ideally to fit the eldritch theme of Cthulhu ornate shoulders and tentacle horns, perhaps replace his crown during ultimate with a purple eye?

Honestly, they *could* get away with the base VFX on it, since it doesn't necessarily look bad, but *should* they? No lol. Shadowy purple effects to match the gems in his armor would look *sick as hell*.
Imo all skins should get recolored effects like kayle. Infernal is only 520 and it has all fire effects.

> [{quoted}](name=DUDE BRO,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=nEaEmkpE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-30T01:15:28.859+0000)
>
> Imo all skins should get recolored effects like kayle. Infernal is only 520 and it has all fire effects.

I'd be fine with the lower tier skins staying with base vfx since they don't look that bad with them, but Lord is literally the only other 'high tier' skin he has. They even said they'd try harder with the skin effects since he has mostly low tier skins.
Pentakill and Lord need to get unique recalls because of 975RP cost. Its mind boggling that lower tier skins have better quality control than those two.

I think that this skin should get some other colorful effects. Because it makes no sence that he costs 975 rp then pentakill {{champion:82}}  cost the same but he has way more effects then lord one and infernal cost only 520 but it looks like a 975 skin.It is also weird how many 520 rp skins have atleast their effect where 750 rp just has different look and not a single new effect or recalls. So this is basicly a 750 rp skin ...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Yeah, and you know GIVE THE SKINS DIFFERENT RECALLS? 

Like seriously riot, you make new recalls for every new skin, and yet morde doesn't get more than 1 recall for his rework? The recall doesn't even fit most of his skins.
It really needs the purple effects. I would accept it just matching, and getting outdone in every way by the cheaper fire skin. whatever. Just don't leave the purple skin glowing teal.

I want lightning particles and an "eye of the storm" ultimate.  I don't have much preference on what color the effects are.  Actually, this skin would be really great with chromas to let owners choose which color they want the particles and embellishments to be.  
I'd probably go with dark/black armor and white + copper/gold embellishments and particles as an "Eclipse" chroma if that were added.  That would look really nice with a brightly colored passive aura surrounding a darkly colored silhouette.
